initContainers.name: install-cni
command: set -e -x; if [ ! -f /etc/cni/net.d/10-kuberouter.conflist ]; then if [ -f /etc/cni/net.d/*.conf ]; then rm -f /etc/cni/net.d/*.conf; fi; TMP=/etc/cni/net.d/.tmp-kuberouter-cfg; cp /etc/kube-router/cni-conf.json ${TMP}; mv ${TMP} /etc/cni/net.d/10-kuberouter.conflist; fi
